title: Financial Literacy Improvement Course through Real-Life Financial Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Activity-based education combining simple smartphone app usage with offline case studies

learning_goals: Students can create personal budget sheets and analyze monthly spending patterns
Students can calculate returns/costs of simple financial products (deposits, savings, loans)
Students can explain financial decision-making processes tailored to real-life scenarios (household debt, children’s education planning, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
